description:
Protect your bike from the bumps and dings of everyday life. This protective film is designed for bikes, not for cars or helicopters. Self-healing vinyl compound keeps your paint looking fresh, because cool as scars are, add don’t add resale value.

  • Covered kits offer ~60% coverage for most high-risk areas: toptube top, bottom tube bottom, chainstays, and seat stays
  • Available in matte or gloss finish
  • Self-healing film smooths out in the warmth of a sunny day
  • Low-friction surface sheds dirt easily
  • RideWrap guarantees products for 10 years against discolouration and cracking
  • Easy to apply at home – some trimming may be required
  • Includes application solution, cloth, applicator squeegee, and instructions
name: RideWrap Covered Protection - MTB Kit
